page.title: 13NESTON SURVEYS
page.content:
Recreation
We carried out a survey in Little Neston to find out about Sport and Leisure activities. 71% were fond of sport, and 23% thought that you didn't need to partake in sport to keep fit. 77% would prefer to go out fo a meal than to go out to a sports evening. Only 17% were members of Neston Rec. Centre. 22% had been to Wimbledon to watch a tennis final. 23% went jogging too.
Transport We interviewed people in our area and found that 65% had a car in their family, although only 63% of these people were able to drive. 38% of the drivers had passed their driving test first time. 59% of the cars owned in our survey were British made.
